One of the social media platforms you can use is Mastodon!

It is not as straightforward as other social media platforms and may require some getting used to. [SURF hosts a pilot](https://www.surf.nl/en/mastodon-pilot-for-research-and-education) which is making it easy to join their instance and get started!
